data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Li, Chun-Lin, Wang, Chuan-Chan, Chen, Hou-Jay (2011): Synopsis of the genus Amphicoma Latreille (Coleoptera: Glaphyridae) of Taiwan with special reference to the male genitalia. Zootaxa 2790: 23-34, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.206618
